descripccion: You're eligible for a Genius discount at La Quinta San Andrés! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.Set in a large house a 20-minute drive Otavalo, in the Northern province of Imbabura, La Quinta San Andrés features a big garden with a swimming pool, a sauna and a spa. A restaurant is featured.Decorated with tiled floors and stylish furnishing, rooms at San Andres Lodge feature LCD TV and spacious seating areas. Some of them have private balconies and terraces.Spa facilities include a sauna and Turkish bath. Guests can relax by the pool or enjoy themselves reading a book in the lobby.La Quinta San Andrés is 81 mi from Quito’s Airport.
direccion: Av. 13 de Abril 17-54 y Esmeraldas, EC100150 Ibarra, Ecuador–Great location - show map

comentarios.p_comentario: El lugar es muy bonito, tiene facilidades y está muy bien mantenido. la ubicación es muy buena, fácil de llegar. cierran la puerta principal a las 9pm y si no tienes una simcard Ecuatoriana o Roaming no puedes llamar al señor que abre la puerta. no tienen timbre. los camiones de gas pasan desde las 6am con un ruido fatal una música que te despierta cada 20 minutos, así que descansar imposible. y hay un gato y sapos que hacen tanto ruido por las noches, que deberían retirarlos de la propiedad, porque tampoco dejan descansar. en pocas palabras si no vas con tapones para los oídos estás frito. El desayuno incluido es rico pero pequeño, he estado en hoteles que pago lo mismo por noche con buffets u ofertas más amplias, soy consciente que es una hacienda ubicada en una ciudad pequeña, pero creo que lo pueden hacer mejor.
Estancia cómoda y confortable , el personal atento y servicial , excelente comida
Exceptional
Wonderful
Exceptional
La ubicación y los bonitos espacios naturales Falto un poco más de limpieza

Las instalaciones Mal servicio , las habitaciones sin chanpo jabón papel higiénico, sin alfombras al siguiente día ña recepción vacía al entregar las llaves y retirar un encargo no hubo a quien entregar la habitación el turco no sirvió
todo muy lindo y acogedor que la televisión tenía mala señal de cable
problemas en la facturación y lentitud para dar una respuesta

El lugar muy cómo y el desayuno excelente Al estar muy lleno, tuve problema de presión de agua, pero fue manejable aunque si es bueno que lo tomen en cuenta
Wonderful
Buen desayuno

La comida en el hotel fue buena; tanto el desayuno, como el almuerzo estuvieron bien preparados y servidos adecuadamente, si bien es cierto que el menú en la carta no es muy abundante. 
La amabilidad del personal fue buena; estuvieron prestos a ayudar, a servir y atender. Tuvimos problemas con la chimenea... entró humo a la habitación y tuvimos que cambiarnos de habitación. En principio, no nos dieron opción de cambio; tuvimos que insistir y ahí sí nos cambiaron. Las almohadas podrían ser confortables; son muy abultadas y duras.

descripccion: Offering a la carte restaurant, Hotel la Giralda is located in Ibarra Town Center, just a 10-minute walk from Laguna shopping center. Free Wi-Fi access is available.Each room here features a flat-screen cable TV and a private bathroom with a shower or bathtub, plus a hairdryer.At Hotel la Giralda you will find a tennis court and a fitness center, and the property also offers meeting facilities for up to 600 people.The popular artisanal market can be reached in a 10-minute drive, while Mariscal Sucre International Airport is 68 mi from the property.
direccion: Av atahualpa 15-142 y Juan Francisco Bonilla, 100150 Ibarra, Ecuador–Great location - show map

descripccion: Located in Ibarra, a 8-minute walk from Central Bank Museum, Hotel Montecarlo provides accommodations with a restaurant, free private parking and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers a concierge service and luggage storage space. The property has a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.At the hotel, every room includes a closet, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels.A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Hotel Montecarlo.Ibarra is a 10-minute walk from the accommodation, while Hacienda Cananvalle is 1.4 km away. The nearest airport is Quito Mariscal Sucre International Airport, 103 km from Hotel Montecarlo.
direccion: Av. Jaime Rivadeneira 5-55 y Miguel Oviedo, 100150 Ibarra, Ecuador–Great location - show map

descripccion: Located in Ibarra, within one kilometer of Central Bank Museum and a 12-minute walk of Hacienda Cananvalle, Zidko Guest House provides accommodations with a terrace and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The property is around 1.8 km from Imbaya, 1.9 km from Ibarra and 2.6 km from Hacienda Azaya. The property has a shared kitchen and a tour desk for guests.At the guesthouse, each room is equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Rooms are equipped with an electric tea pot, while some rooms are equipped with a kitchen with a microwave and a fridge. Guest rooms include a closet.Hacienda Pugacho is 3.4 km from Zidko Guest House, while Hacienda El Milagro is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Quito Mariscal Sucre International Airport, 103 km from the accommodation.
direccion: Alfredo Gomez Jaime 543, 100150 Ibarra, Ecuador–Great location - show map

descripccion: Located in Ibarra, within 3.4 km of Central Bank Museum and 1.9 km of Hacienda La Victoria, El Balcon de los Reyes provides accommodations with a terrace and free WiFi as well as free private parking for guests who drive. All rooms have a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom. The property has a 24-hour front desk and room service for guests.At the inn, rooms come with a closet.Guests at El Balcon de los Reyes can enjoy an American breakfast.At the accommodation guests are welcome to use a hot tub.Yaguarcocha is 3.4 km from El Balcon de los Reyes, while El Olivo is 3.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Quito Mariscal Sucre International Airport, 106.2 km from the inn.
direccion: El Olivo Alto Via Miguel Arcangel, 100110 Ibarra, Ecuador–Excellent location – show map

La vista es hermosa. La persona que nos atendió muy atenta y dispuesta a solventar cualquier inquietud para hacer nuestra estadía confortable.
Un lugar espectacular, tiene una vista hacia la Laguna única. Recomendado, la atención y la amabilidad del personal es única. Perfecto para desconectarse y relejarse. Todo me gustó

No hay suficiente enchufes en la habitación. Sólo habían dos en todo el cuarto. Uno debajo la mesa de noche y otro detrás del espaldar de la cama que no servía. No había ningún enchufe en el baño ni en el resto del cuarto (solo en la parte superior donde está la TV) lo cual hizo un poco complicado cargar la batería de varios dispositivos. Especialmente para alguien que viaja por trabajo (laptop, teléfono, etc).
La ubicación, silencio y tranquilidad Que recarguen el precio por pagar con tarjeta y la señal de TV es muy mala.

Well recommended. We will return.

descripccion: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Hostal Fevilamir! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.Featuring a terrace, a bar, and a restaurant that serves characteristic dishes of Ecuador, Hostal Fevilamir offers panoramic views of the Imbabura Volcano.This rooms in Hostal Fevilamir feature a private bathroom with shower, LCD cable TV, a seating area, and a balcony.The 24-hour front desk can arrange laundry services. Wi-Fi is available in all areas and is free of charge.Hostal Fevilamir is conveniently located 100 m from Amazonas Market, 300 m from the bus station and the train station, and 400 m from Ibarra Obelisk.

descripccion: Located at the top of a hill and featuring a restaurant with panoramic mountain views, La Estelita offers free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool in Ibarra.  The city center is 3.7 mi away.Providing a tranquil environment, the rooms and suites in La Estelita feature private bathrooms and balconies with city views. Room service is available.A continental breakfast is served daily. The restaurant is open until 20:00 from Monday to Thursday, until 21:00 on Friday and Saturday and until 18:00 on Sunday.Guests at La Estelita can relax by the fireplace at the lobby or in the sauna. The front desk remains open form 8.00 to 21.00. Laundry services can be arranged.La Estelita is 75 mi from Mariscal Sucre airport and 137 mi from Las Peñas beach. Free private parking is possible on site.
direccion: Km. 5 Vía Yuracrucito, EC100150 Ibarra, Ecuador–Excellent location – show map

descripccion: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Hosteria Cananvalle! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.Featuring a restaurant and a big garden overlooking the Cotacachi Volcanoes, Hosteria Cananvalle offers rooms with free Wi-Fi in charming cottages right in front of Chorlavi River. Breakfast is provided, and a volleyball court is featured. Ibarra’s city center is 10 minutes away by car.Decorated with exposed brick walls and tiled floors, rooms at Cananvalle are fresh and airy. They feature seating areas and telephones. Laundry service is provided.A continental breakfast is served daily in the charming breakfast room overlooking the volcanoes. The restaurant offers a wide variety of local and international dishes.Guests can unwind on the hammock featured in the shaded galleries or enjoy themselves playing board games.  Several bird species can be watched from the garden.Free parking is provided. Hosteria Cananvalle is 4.3 mi from Ibarra Train Station and a 10-minute drive from Banco Central Museum.
direccion: Sector Cananvalle, EC100150 Ibarra, Ecuador–Excellent location – show map

descripccion: Featuring a garden, Hostal Quinta San Carlos is located in Ibarra in the Imbabura region, a 6-minute walk from Central Bank Museum and 549 m from Ibarra. The property is around 1.9 km from Hacienda Azaya, 1.8 km from Hacienda Cananvalle and 2.7 km from Imbaya. The property provides a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi throughout the property.At the hotel, every room includes a closet, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels.La Alpargata is 3.2 km from Hostal Quinta San Carlos, while Hacienda Yacucalle is 3.2 km away. The nearest airport is Quito Mariscal Sucre International Airport, 103 km from the accommodation.

descripccion: Located in Ibarra, 9.5 km from Central Bank Museum, Casa Aida Hostal y Restaurante has accommodations with a restaurant, free private parking, a bar and a shared lounge. Featuring room service, this property also provides guests with a grill. The property provides a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen and currency exchange for guests.At the guesthouse, rooms have a desk. Featuring a shared bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at Casa Aida Hostal y Restaurante also feature free WiFi, while certain rooms come with a patio.The accommodation offers a continental or à la carte breakfast.Guests at Casa Aida Hostal y Restaurante will be able to enjoy activities in and around Ibarra, like cycling.Popular points of interest near the guesthouse include Hacienda San Clemente, Hacienda El Troje and Hacienda Cacho de Hospital. The nearest airport is Quito Mariscal Sucre International, 96.6 km from Casa Aida Hostal y Restaurante, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.
direccion: VIA A OLMEDO 19291, Ibarra, Ecuador, 100150 Ibarra, Ecuador–Excellent location – show map

comentarios.p_comentario: La amabilidad del personal  y la tranquilidad de lugar
La comida, el servicio, la habitación y patios El baño de ducha, no había agua caliente y no sé.notaba muy limpio

The breakfast was great very tasty pancakes. This place is super hospitable. The grandmother has been receiving people since the 70s. It has a very homy feeling and they take care of everything you might need.
A wonderful, homy feeling. Hospitable, good vibes and beautiful stories.
 The showers weren’t working very good because of the water pressure. Apparently this a problem in the whole village and isn’t in their hands.
Personal sehr freundlich und das Essen sehr gut. Zimmer nicht sowie auf den Bildern - sehr rustikal.
Very Good
Personal muy carismático
La tranquilidad del lugar
El servicio y el trato de la dueña No nos dieron toalla
Amabilidad  de la propietaria. Y el Guía Charles es muy carismático.
Muy buen servicio,en especial el restaurante

Un lugar muy acogedor con gente muy agradable, en medio de un hermoso y tranquilo paisaje. Excelente ubicación  a 20 minutos del centro de Ibarra, el mejor lugar para hospedarse antes y después de subir al volcán Imbabura. Aida es si propietaria y tiene una gran historia de 47 años al frente del hostal, fue la pionera en emprender e impulsar el turismo en La Esperanza. Deliciosa comida y desayunos desde muy temprano. Un lugar muy recomendado para todo el público en general.

descripccion: Located in Ibarra, a 3-minute walk from Central Bank Museum, Hostal EL CALLEJÓN has accommodations with free WiFi and free private parking. The property is around a 6-minute walk from Ibarra, 1.8 km from Hacienda Cananvalle and 2.7 km from La Alpargata. The hotel has family rooms.The reception at the hotel can provide tips on the area.Hacienda Yacucalle is 2.7 km from Hostal EL CALLEJÓN, while Hacienda Pugacho is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Quito Mariscal Sucre International, 103 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.
direccion: 738 Pedro Moncayo entre Olmedo y Sánchez y Cifuentes, 100105 Ibarra, Ecuador–Excellent location – show map

descripccion: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Hotel Plaza Victoria! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.Featuring a restaurant and a fitness center, Hotel Plaza Victoria offers rooms with free WiFi in Ibarra's financial district. Free parking is provided 200 m away.Decorated with tiled floors and vibrant colors, rooms at Plaza Victoria are fitted with cable TV and private bathrooms. Some units offer large windows. Free WiFi is provided as well.La Herencia is a grill restaurant in front of the property that offers a varied menu at lunch and dinner.Hotel Plaza Victoria offers a laundry service . Hotel Plaza Victoria is 500 m from the bus terminal and an 8-minute walk from Laguna shopping center. A variety of banks, restaurants and bars are within a few steps, while Ibarra's train station is 5 minutes away on foot.Mariscal Sucre International Airport is a 1.5-hour drive away.
direccion: Calle Bolivar 12-101 Y Rafael Larrea, EC100150 Ibarra, Ecuador–Great location - show map

descripccion: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Refugio Terra Esperanza! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.This colorful hostel offers rooms with free Wi-Fi and shared bathrooms in Esperanza town, only 100 m from Santa Maria de la Esperanza church. Horse riding and trekking trips can be booked.Refugio Terra Esperanza offers a daily continental breakfast with eggs, juice and bread for a surcharge. There are BBQ facilities, a restaurant with regional dishes common kitchen facilities.Cubilche Lake is 1.9 mi from Refugio Terra and the tour desk can offer advise for getting around the area.Ibarra City is 3.7 mi away and private parking is free. There is 24-hour front desk assistance and luggage storage.
direccion: Calle Galo Plaza Lasso, La Esperanza, 100154 Ibarra, Ecuador–Excellent location – show map

comentarios.p_comentario: Familiäre Atmosphäre, schlichte und rustikale Zimmer, Kaminfeuer, Tourenmöglichkeiten Etwas feucht in dem Zimmer, keine Möglichkeit Sachen aufzuhängen oder einzuschließen
Exceptional

La gentillesse de Emerson et de sa maman. Ils sont adorables et font en sorte que tout soit au mieux pour nous.
Il y a pas mal de randonnées à faire, dont le volcan, les paysages sont superbes !
La atención Omitido

Emerson est un super guide. Il connait bien sa région et les montagnes, ce qui permet une vraie immersion dans le pays. Hostel idéal pour les personnes qui veulent randonner en compagnie d'un bon guide et découvrir le pays d'une façon authentique.
L'hébergement est spartiate, mais c'est toujours mieux qu'une tente!
Emerson el host principal es una gran persona y te hace sentir en casa Nada

I came to this hostel and ended up at that moment the only guest staying there. A bit out of the way and tired, I didn't expect it to be the wonderful ecperience it was. All credit goes to Emerson. He's a beautiful and amazing human being I spent hours speaking with about everything and he did his absolute best to make me comfortable, not as a business but as a friend. The environment and facilities fhemselves were really creative and cool. With a group of people, I can imagine it being a place you could get stuck at!
Exceptional

Gastgeber sehr freundlich hilfsbereit entgegen kommend. Gute Lage fuer Touren auf Imbambura und Cubilche.
Fruehstueck (Lunchpaket) war gut. Anzahl Steckdosen im Zimmer.

Awesome place, nice people , recommended. Hermoso hostal , buena gente ! Todo bonito ++
Exceptional

J’ai été impressionné par la chaleur de l’accueil du tenancier, Rodman, qui semble connaître tout le monde dans le village et qui m’a spontanément invité à prendre un verre chez son oncle. Il a très bien su me renseigner pour les excursions à pratiquer dans les environs et m’a vraiment donné l’envie de prolonger mon séjour.
L’établissement sert de typiques et délicieux petits déjeuners et dîners. Les lits sont faits chaque jour. Le soir, on allume un bon feu de cheminée. L’ambiance est détendue et familiale. Pas d’ordinateur fixe à disposition de la clientèle et le Wifi semble ne pas fonctionner la nuit.
La calidez de los dueños Me encantó todo

La atención.
Gracias.
Disappointing

This place is an up-and-coming community of open-minded, warm hearted, incredible hosts that will not only make you feel at home but will guide you through adventures you might never find on your own.
An gem in La Esperanza
 I’m extremely sensitive to mold and I did detect some in the bedroom, but that didn’t really affect our stay or our positive review of this place! It’s a very special hostel!
Sehr nette Besitzer und schönes Ambiente. Frühstück und ein warmes Abendessen waren beim Preis mit inbegriffen.
Exceptional

To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.With Central Bank Museum reachable in 3.4 miles, Tunas & Cabras Hotel provides accommodations, a restaurant, an outdoor swimming pool, a bar and a shared lounge. The lodge features both WiFi and private parking free of charge.There's a fully equipped private bathroom with bath and free toiletries.à la carte and American breakfast options are available daily at Tunas & Cabras Hotel.The accommodation has a playground.Guests at Tunas & Cabras Hotel can enjoy pool on site, or go horse riding or cycling in the surrounding areas.Hacienda Azaya is 4.8 km from the lodge, while Hacienda La Victoria is 5 km away. We reserved a room with a double bunk and a full size bed.
also I paid in full trough booking.com the hotel contact me after that, and they send me the reservation.
Anyhow when we get to the place they said that they have no idea about booking.com and also that they haven’t received payment through booking. The hotel it’s ok and very comfy specially if you like nature. Just make sure that if you book trough any online app double check with them before you go. 
What it’s really weird and unethical it’s that if they don’t have contact with the app why and how they contact me trough text messages email and what’s app if I never contact them directly.
Good
 Really poor service through online apps. Nowadays that’s the only way to book a hotel around the world so you guys need to improve.
Very Good

INCREÍBLE! Un lugar único, es mucho mejor a lo qué se percibe en las fotos de la publicidad. La atención del personal fue fenomenal, la comida exquisita, las habitaciones hermosas, confortables e impecables. 
El Hotel es hermoso, cada detalle lo han hecho de una manera especial. 
100% RECOMENDADO!
